column1: Actively doing things together is for you an important part of a good relationship
column2: Believes that actively doing things together is an important part of a good relationship.

column1: Being able to talk openly about your feelings is important to you
column2: Feels it is important to be able to talk openly about feelings.

column1: Consistency and security in your relationship are important to you

column1: Personal freedom within the bounds of a loving relationship is important to you
